init.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/danielcherubini/elegoo-homeassistant

data.proxy_enabled: Enable the proxy server (restart after changing this)

discover_printers.title: Select Printer
discover_printers.description: Choose a discovered printer from the list or opt to enter the IP address manually.

manual_ip.title: Manual Setup
manual_ip.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/danielcherubini/elegoo-homeassistant

fdm_options.title: FDM Printer Options
fdm_options.description: Configure additional options for your selected printer. [Read more about the proxy server](https://github.com/danielcherubini/elegoo-homeassistant/discussions/185).

resin_options.title: Resin Printer Options
resin_options.description: Enabling the camera can create instability in the printer. Use at your own risk. [Read more for details and best practices](https://github.com/danielcherubini/elegoo-homeassistant/discussions/199).

error.connection: Unable to connect to the printer.
error.no_printer_found: No printer could be found at the specified IP address.
error.validation_no_printer_found: Validation failed: No printer was found.
error.no_printer_selected_or_ip_provided: Please select a discovered printer or provide an IP address.
error.manual_options_no_printer_found: The selected printer could not be found to apply options.
error.init_no_printer_found: Failed to initialize: The printer could not be found.
